title: AD shift does not shift long run Phillips curve

content.question: Which of the following is true about the Phillips curve?

choices.label: A change in aggregate demand does not shift the long-run Phillips curve (LRPC).
A change in aggregate demand does not cause a movement along the short-run Phillips curve (SRPC).
The LRPC shows the trade-off between unemployment and inflation but the SRPC does not.
Changes in expected inflation affect the LRPC only.
Negative supply shocks affect the LRPC only.

content.answer: A change in aggregate demand does not shift the long-run Phillips curve (LRPC).
